faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about AI Voice Cloning for Video

items.title: What types of videos can benefit from voice cloning?
items.description: Our technology is perfect for a variety of video types including tutorials, presentations, documentaries, and marketing content.

items.title: Is there a limit to how much I can generate?
items.description: Yes! Users receive 20 free voiceover credits per day, with options to purchase additional credits or subscribe for unlimited access.

items.title: Can I use the generated voiceovers commercially?
items.description: Absolutely! All paid subscriptions allow for commercial use of generated voiceovers. Free-tier users may have restrictions.

items.title: How secure is my data during processing?
items.description: We use advanced encryption methods, ensuring that your uploaded content and generated voiceovers remain completely confidential.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Videos?
footer.description: Try our AI Voice Cloning now and experience it for yourself. No sign-up required.
